parts:
Mavado, the Jamaican dancehall artist, has collaborated with several hip-hop artists on compilation tracks. Notable examples include:

- **"I Ain't Going Back Broke"**: This track features Mavado alongside Future and Ace Hood, blending dancehall and hip-hop elements. citeturn0search3

- **"Freaks (Remix)"**: Mavado joined French Montana, Nicki Minaj, Rick Ross, Wale, and DJ Khaled on this remix, showcasing a fusion of dancehall and rap styles. citeturn0search17

- **"Lighters Up"**: A collaboration with Snoop Lion (formerly Snoop Dogg) and Popcaan, this song merges reggae and hip-hop influences. citeturn0search12

These tracks highlight Mavado's versatility and his ability to seamlessly integrate dancehall vibes into the hip-hop genre.
